author: entertainment.ie
title: MovieNews | Remember the terrifying Twins from The Shining? This is what they look like now
text:
For anyone that hasn't seen the Stanley Kubrick classic, The Shining, then you're a cinematic moron and we feel sorry for you.
But fear not, it's the perfect time of year to track it down and bask in it's terrifying goodness. From, like, behind a couch.
Anyone who has seen it will recall the scary ass twins there. While we've seen some scary young ones knocking around Supermacs at 4am on a Sunday morning, those two are a different level.
This is what the ladies looked like a couple of months ago. Obviously still enjoying their iconic roles in a full blown classic.
Look out for my interview with the awesome @Shining_twins this Sunday after 3pm on @RadioSaltire :) xx pic.twitter.com/1O7DLTOv6Z
â€” Kevin Hall (@Kev_h80) August 24, 2015 Lisa and Louise Burns are from the UK, and are now both 46. They didn't do much acting after the Stephen King adaptation but their places in cinematic history are surely cemented.
Also, this is every bit as good ... in a very different way.
Via AOL
